author: Winston Churchill
message: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity. The optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
title: Thought of the day

author: Albert Gray
message: Winners have simply formed the habit of doing things losers don't like to do.
title: Thought of the day

author: Ralph Emerson
message: Nature is a mutable cloud which is always and never the same.
title: Thought of the day

author: Grandma Moses
message: Life is what you make of it. Always has been, always will be.
title: Thought of the day
